#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int

int main()
{
	ll t,n,c,i,j;
	scanf("%lld", &t);

	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld", &n);
		scanf("%lld", &c);
		int *a = new int [n];
		ll s = 0;
		for(i = 0; i<n; i++)
		{
			ll temp;
			scanf("%lld", &temp);
			a[i]=temp;
			s+= a[i];
		}
		(s<=c)?cout<<"Yes\n":cout<<"No\n";

	}
	return 0;
}
